ARTICLE.TITLE: Recalling the sailors of the USS Frank E. Evans
ARTICLE.TEXT: Are you a veteran searching for employment? To facilitate employment efforts for both job seekers and employers, DAV & RecruitMilitary will host the Greater Boston Virtual Career Fair for Veterans Thursday from 11 a.m. to 3 p.m. online.
